c1.name: Flower Of Eden
c1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

c2.name: Opening Of Phanerozoic
c2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
*Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
*The effect stacks up to 4 times.

c3.name: Grace Of Helios
c3.effect: Increases the level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Descent Of Divinity
c4.effect: Solar Isotoma increases Plunging Attack DMG by 30% for active party members within the AoE.

c5.name: Tide Of Hadean
c5.effect: Increases the level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Domain Of Purification
c6.effect: If active party members within the AoE are protected by a shield created by Crystallize, Solar Isotoma increases their DMG by 17%.

c1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
c1.effect:
Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
The second arrow is fired 10 degrees vertically below actual aiming, has separate critical, and also makes the primary shot travel further before it starts dropping down.

c2.name: Bunny Triggered
c2.effect:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c3.name: It Burns!
c3.effect: Increases the level of Fiery Rain by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
c4.effect: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

c5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
c5.effect: Increases the level of Explosive Puppet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wildfire
c6.effect: Fiery Rain increases the entire party's Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c1.name: Gleeful Songs
c1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

c2.name: Vitality Burst
c2.effect: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin by 15%. During the ability's duration, your active character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect: Increases the level of Shining Miracle by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attentiveness be My Power
c4.effect: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her. A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect: Increases the level of Let the Show Begin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is not on the field, and one of your characters in the party falls:
*Automatically revives this character.
*Fully regenerates this character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.effect: When Stormbreaker is used: Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s. This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.effect: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.effect: Increases the level of Tidecaller by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.effect: Increases the level of Stormbreaker by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of the Evil
c6.effect: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK. (Additive increase)

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When HP falls below 70%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect: Increases Passion Overload's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect: Short hold to release Passion Overload as a two-stage attack. Press the attack button to perform an additional falling attack.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect: Increases Fantastic Voyage's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures with Me
c6.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

c1.name: Ice Unleashed
c1.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

c2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
c2.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

c3.name: Cloudburst
c3.effect: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Skies
c4.effect: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo. This effect can only occur once every 2s.

c5.name: The True Path
c5.effect: Increases the level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rally of Four Blades
c6.effect: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun. This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

c1.name: Conviction
c1.effect: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

c2.name: Searing Ember
c2.effect:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10%, and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Last for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c3.name: Fire and Steel
c3.effect: Increases Searing Onslaught's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Flowing Flame
c4.effect:
Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt.
Within 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.

c5.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
c5.effect: Increases Dawn's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark
c6.effect:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo

c1.name: A Lingering Flavor
c1.effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

c2.name: Shaken, Not Purred
c2.effect: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

c3.name: A-Another Round?
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wine Industry Slayer
c4.effect: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

c5.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
c6.effect:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
*Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
*Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

c1.name: Gaze of the Deep
c1.effect:
Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through the crow's eyes. When Fischl attacks an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack through the crow's eyes, dealing 22% of ATK DMG.
Note: The additional attack is fired from the orb near Fischl's shoulder and is only fired on normal attacks that have locked on to an enemy, regardless if it is blocked by obstacles or missed. The attack has slight homing and may bypass obstacles.

c2.name: Devourer of All Sins
c2.effect: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

c3.name: Wings of Nightmare
c3.effect: Increases Nightrider's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
c4.effect: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents. When the skill duration ends, Fischl recovers 20% of her HP.

c5.name: Against the Fleeing Light
c5.effect: Increases Midnight Phantasmagoria's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Evernight Raven
c6.effect: Increases the duration of Oz's summoning by 2s. Additionally, Oz attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

c1.name: Dew-Drinker
c1.effect:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

c2.name: The Auspicious
c2.effect: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

c3.name: Cloud-Strider
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Westward Sojourn
c4.effect:
Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time. Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

c5.name: The Merciful
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Clement
c6.effect: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

c1.name: Spiraling Tempest
c1.effect: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

c2.name: People's Aegis
c2.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

c3.name: When the West Wind Arises
c3.effect: Increases the level of Dandelion Breeze by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lands of Dandelion
c4.effect: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

c5.name: Outbursting Gust
c5.effect: Increases the level of Gale Blade by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
c6.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

c1.name: Excellent Blood
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal Attack and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by the Cryo is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Never-Ending Performance
c2.effect: With every defeated opponent, the duration of Glacial Waltz is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

c3.name: Dance of Frost
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Kiss
c4.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
*Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
*This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
*Can only occur once every 60s.

c5.name: Frostbiting Embrace
c5.effect: Increases the level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Max upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Glacial Whirlwind
c6.effect: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

c1.name: Thundering Might
c1.effect: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

c2.name: Keen Extraction
c2.effect: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s

c3.name: Foreseen Reformation
c3.effect: Increases the level of Starward Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attunement
c4.effect: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

c5.name: Beckoning Stars
c5.effect: Increases the level of Stellar Restoration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tenacious Star
c6.effect: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

c1.name: Chained Reactions
c1.effect: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

c2.name: Explosive Frags
c2.effect: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c3.name: Exquisite Compound
c3.effect: Increases the level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c4.name: Sparkly Explosion
c4.effect: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c5.name: Nova Burst
c5.effect: Increases the level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c6.name: Blazing Delight
c6.effect:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.effect:
Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.effect:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
*Increases DEF by 25%.
*Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.effect: Increases the level of Lightning Rose by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.effect: Increases the level of Violet Arc by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.effect:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c1.name: Prophecy of Submersion
c1.effect:
The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s after any of your characters in the party hit an opponent affected by an Omen:
*Electro-Charged DMG is increased by 15%.
*Vaporize DMG is increased by 15%.
*Hydro Swirl DMG is increased by 15%.
*The duration for which enemies are Frozen is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Lunar Chain
c2.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

c3.name: Restless Revolution
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
c4.effect: When any character in the party attacks an opponent affected by the Omen status effect, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

c5.name: Mockery of Fortuna
c5.effect: Increase the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
c6.effect: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG her next Charged Attack per second of movement. A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

c1.name: Piercing Fragments
c1.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

c2.name: Shock Effect
c2.effect: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset. This effect can only take place every 6 seconds.

c3.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
c3.effect: Increases Starshatter's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.

c4.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
c4.effect: Allies within a 10m radius of the Jade Screen take 10% less Elemental DMG.

c5.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
c5.effect: Increases Jade Screen's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.

c6.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
c6.effect: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

c1.name: I Got Your Back
c1.effect: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, attacks hits have a 100% chance to trigger Breastplate's healing effects.

c2.name: Combat Maid
c2.effect: Decreases Noelle's Stamina Consumption of Charged Attacks by 20% and increases Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

c3.name: Invulnerable Maid
c3.effect: Increases Breastplate's skill level by 3. Max level is 15

c4.name: To Be Cleaned
c4.effect: When Breastplate ends or shatters, it deals 400% of ATK as Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

c5.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
c5.effect: Increases Sweeping Time's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.

c6.name: Must Be Spotless
c6.effect: Sweeping Time increases ATK by an additional 50% of Noelle's DEF. For the skill's duration, adds 1s duration time per opponent defeated, up to 10s.

c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 energy.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.effect: Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.effect:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all nearby fallen party members and regenerates 50% of their HP.
*This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Wolf's Instinct
c1.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

c2.name: Suppression
c2.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

c3.name: Soul Companion
c3.effect: Increases the level of Lightning Fang by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c4.name: Bite
c4.effect: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

c5.name: Sharpened Claws
c5.effect: Increases the level of Claw and Thunder by 3. Maximum level is 15.

c6.name: Lupus Fulguris
c6.effect: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG. When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder

c1.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
c1.effect: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

c2.name: Beth: Unbound Form
c2.effect: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

c3.name: Flawless Alchemistress
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Alchemania
c4.effect: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1~7s.

c5.name: Caution: Standard Flask
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chaotic Entropy
c6.effect: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

c1.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
c1.effect: Decrease the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%

c2.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
c2.effect: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated. Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

c3.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrosprout
c4.effect:
If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effects on those time intervals.

c5.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
c5.effect: Increases the level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Havoc: Annihilation
c6.effect: When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset. This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

c1.name: Raging Vortex
c1.effect: Palm Vortex pulls in enemies within a 5m radius.

c2.name: Uprising Whirlwind
c2.effect: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

c3.name: Sweeping Gust
c3.effect: Increases the level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Cherishing Breezes
c4.effect: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

c5.name: Vortex Stellaris
c5.effect: Increases the level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Intertwined Winds
c6.effect:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Invincible Stonewalln
c1.effect: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

c2.name: Rockcore Meltdown
c2.effect: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

c3.name: Will of the Rock
c3.effect: Increases the level of Wake of Earth by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Reaction Force
c4.effect: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner.

c5.name: Meteorite Impact
c5.effect: Increases the level of Starfell Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Everlasting Boulder
c6.effect: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

c1.name: Splitting Gales
c1.effect:
Fires 2 additional split arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
The additional arrows are fired in a 30° horizontal cone (each 15° to left and right), possibly hitting and damaging the same target in close range. Each arrow has its own critical.

c2.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.effect: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c3.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
c3.effect: Increases the level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c5.name: Concerto dal Cielo
c5.effect: Increases the level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. The maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Storm of Defiance
c6.effect: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c1.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
c1.effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

c2.name: Oil Meets Fire
c2.effect: The last attack in Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

c3.name: Deepfry
c3.effect: Increases the level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Slowbake
c4.effect: Pyronado's duration is increased by 40%.

c5.name: Guoba Mad
c5.effect: Increases the level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Condensed Pyronado
c6.effect: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

c1.name: The Scent Remained
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

c2.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
c2.effect: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain by 15% for 4s.

c3.name: Weaver of Verses
c3.effect: Increases the level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Evilsoother
c4.effect: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

c5.name: Embrace of Rain
c5.effect: Increases the level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
c6.effect: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit opponents.

c1.name: Fatal Acceleration
c1.effect: Upon scoring a CRIT hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s. Can only occur once every 5s.

c2.name: Impromptu Opening
c2.effect: Riff Revolution Physical DMG has its Crit rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

c3.name: Double-Stop
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wildfire Rhythm
c4.effect: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

c5.name: Screamin' for an Encore
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
c6.effect: Decrease the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

c1.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.

c2.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
c2.effect: Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

c3.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
c3.effect: Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
c4.effect: Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

c5.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
c6.effect: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character. A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
